attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current London 2012 olympics logo looks like it has come from the 80's, sets off people's epilepsy and has no relevence to the city of London, or the country as a whole! If there had been a competition in our schools or on Blue Peter to design the logo, the result would have been vastly superior and would have wasted much less tax payers money. I say we get rid of the current monstrsity and let the people have a go!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
